attributes.action: To remove the smell that comes from vile park Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a smell that the majority of decent people in birmingham have put up with for years. I beg you to remove this and bring peace to those who are at a disadvantage to be living near this dump. Or please issue every house holder and its people a peg to place on nose so as not to be forced to smell what comes from vile park in aston.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
